title: Sophie Molineux: Australia name all-rounder as Alyssa Healy's replacement as captain
desc: All-rounder Sophie Molineux will captain Australia in all formats following the retirement of current skipper Alyssa Healy in March.

title: Sophie Molineux named Australian cricket captain, succeeding Alyssa Healy ahead of India series
desc: Sophie Molineux becomes Australia's new multi-format captain, taking over from Alyssa Healy ahead of a home series against India.

title: Guardiola admits Man City panic over Mourinho's Benfica strategy
desc: Pep Guardiola revealed Manchester City were panicking over their Champions League hopes as Benfica pushed for a late goal against Real Madrid.

title: Rangers to hold Artemi Panarin out of lineup indefinitely ahead of Olympic break
desc: It's not yet clear if a trade is in the works or if the Rangers are protecting their biggest asset from injury concerns ahead of a move.

title: Liverpool 6-0 Qarabag: Can Champions League rescue Liverpool's season of turmoil?
desc: After sweeping their way into the last 16, chief football writer Phil McNulty asks can the Champions League rescue Liverpool's season of turmoil?

title: Video appears to show Alex Pretti in scuffle with federal agents 11 days before his death
desc: A newly released video appears to show Alex Pretti confronting federal officers on a Minneapolis street 11 days before he was fatally shot in another encounter with CBP agents.

title: 9 Million Viewers and Counting, HBO Max Says
desc: HBO Max says ‘Heated Rivalry’ is averaging 9 million viewers so far, although it hasn’t yet cracked Nielsen’s top 10 streaming shows.

title: Counting down to Thaipusam
desc: GEORGE TOWN: As thaneer panthal (refreshment) stalls are set up across the city ahead of Thaipusam, traffic has slowed to a crawl on several major roads.

title: Drama at the opera as Royal Opera chief steps in for sick tenor
desc: Richard Hetherington forced to play Prince Calàf in Giacomo Puccini’s Turandot after French tenor Roberto Alagna taken ill

title: Rare falcons living on the ledge
desc: IPOH: The presence of peregrine falcons in Peninsular Malaysia is closely tied to one critical and increasingly threatened habitat –tall limestone cliffs.
